message: Your turn Alice. How about a slightly better deal for me, since the money's losing value for both of us?
Still willing to compromise, but need a bit more!
The clock is ticking, Alice.  This is a good deal for both of us considering the inflation.
Inflation's bad, but I still want a fair share!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm offering a near even split to get this done before the money shrinks even more!
